subject: World Cup (Skiing)
lead_paragraph: Bode Miller finished second to Michael Walchhofer of Austria in the classic Saslong downhill on Saturday in Val Gardena, Italy, reviving the defense of his overall World Cup title.
snippet: Bode Miller finished second to Michael Walchhofer of Austria in the classic Saslong downhill on Saturday in Val Gardena, Italy, reviving the defense of his overall World Cup title.
